description:
Souta fights the Angelus Gemini to protect his world by placing “Death Flag” on his enemies. Nanami learns from Riru how she is linked to Souta, and takes the Quest Dorm members to help Souta fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hidoi Sekai Da na, Chotto Ura no Yousu o Mite Kuru yo
It`s a Cruel World. I`m Going to Take a Look in the Shadows.
Quel horrible monde. Je vais voir ce qu`il y a derrière.
إنه عالم قاس، سألقي نظرة من الظلال
ひどい世界だな, ちょっと裏の様子を見てくるよ
